name: Avoid using break or continue statements in loops with high cyclomatic complexity (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all artifacts containing break or continue statements in loops with high cyclomatic complexity. Artifacts considered for this quality rule are PHP Section, method, function and constructor.

rationale: Using break or continue statements in loops with high cyclomatic complexity makes code unreadable and difficult to maintain.
remediation: Remove break or continue statements and use loop condition or reduce cyclomatic complexity of the loop.
